text: Motion
Motion
Motion
It's amazing...!

It's like a real building with walls and a ceiling,
and when you go inside, it feels like a real room...────

There are stuffed animals, cushions,
playing cards, snacks, and all sorts of things...!
Wow...!
It's, it's...!
It's just so amazing and cool!!

Haha, yeah.
The space for Hokago Climax Girls was really something.

As expected,
everyone puts their all into everything, I thought.
Ehehe...!

How's the atmosphere?
We brought a lot of stuff, want to play around with it?

Yes! We had snacks with
everyone and had a strategy meeting!

Also, we took a little nap with the members!
The cushions were so comfy...!

The members...
Ah, they're stuffed animals, right?

Yes!
They're the operators of our secret base!
They protect the base when we're not around!
I see!

I also helped with building the base, but walls
and stuff were difficult like Choco-senpai said.

So, everyone in Houkura is incredibly,
incredibly, incredibly cool!
